備考　Note
There are no make-up tests or assignments. Unexcused absences on assessment days will result in a score of zero for the task. If the absence is excused due to medical reasons or other, the student will receive the class avearge score for the quiz/assignment.
Plagiarism means copying other peoples' language and claiming it as your own. This also includes automatic and machine translation, as well as AI language generation. Any instances of plagiarism will result in a score of zero for the task, and possibly for the entire course.
Late submissions of tasks will be penalised in the following way:
Less than 7 days late, or in the folowing lesson= -50%
More than 7 days late= -100%
